import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { MenuService } from './menu.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Barbearia } from './barbearia'; @Component({ selector: 'app-menu', templateUrl: './menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./menu.component.css'] }) export class MenuComponent { barbearias: Barbearia[] = []; constructor(private MenuService: MenuService) {} ngOnInit(){ this.MenuService.getBarbearia().subscribe( Barbearias => { this.barbearias = Barbearias; } ); } }
